properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v2 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c1 c2

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I have surrendered
To Jesus my Lord,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I yield to His will,
I lay down my sword

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
To pick up His banner
And march bold and strong

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
There is no doubt
Whose side I am on,

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I am firmly committed
To the cause of Christ

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Determined to serve Him for the
Rest of my life

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Resolved to give all
No matter the price

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I've come through the valley
There's no turning round

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
I will press toward
The Lord's higher ground

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
The way set before me,
My only concern,

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines:
For I have passed
The point of return

verse.name: c2b
verse.lines:
I am firmly committed
To The Cause of
